beirut.january: Mild and rainy, 9–17°C, frequent storms and humid days.
beirut.february: Cool and wet, 10–18°C, winter rain continues.
beirut.march: Mild, 12–20°C, some rain but sunnier days begin.
beirut.april: Pleasant, 14–23°C, mostly sunny with a light breeze.
beirut.may: Warm, 18–26°C, dry and ideal beach weather starts.
beirut.june: Hot, 22–29°C, very sunny and humid along the coast.
beirut.july: Hot and humid, 24–31°C, peak beach season.
beirut.august: Very hot and sticky, 26–33°C, extremely humid.
beirut.september: Hot but easing slightly, 24–31°C, mostly sunny.
beirut.october: Warm, 20–28°C, some humidity but great for travel.
beirut.december: Cool and rainy, 11–18°C, winter storms possible.

paris.january: Cold and grey, 3–7°C, light rain or frost.
paris.february: Cold, 3–8°C, slightly drier but still winter.
paris.april: Mild, 8–16°C, mix of sun and rain.
paris.may: Pleasant, 12–20°C, one of the best months to visit.
paris.october: Cool, 9–15°C, autumn colors and occasional rain.

rome.august: Very hot, 23–33°C, quiet city due to holidays.

dubai.december: Mild to warm, 18–26°C, sunny and pleasant.

tokyo.march: Cool, 5–14°C, sakura season begins late month.

new york.april: Mild, 7–17°C, mix of rain and sun.

london.january: Cold and damp, 2–8°C, frequent rain and overcast skies.
london.february: Cold, 2–9°C, grey with drizzle and occasional frost.
london.march: Cool, 4–11°C, slowly improving with more sun.
london.april: Mild, 6–14°C, classic mix of showers and sunshine.
london.may: Mild to warm, 9–17°C, greener parks and longer days.
london.june: Pleasant, 12–20°C, generally comfortable with light rain.
london.july: Mild to warm, 14–23°C, occasional short heatwaves.
london.august: Similar to July, 14–23°C, some humid days.
london.september: Mild, 12–20°C, often one of the nicest months.
london.october: Cool, 8–15°C, more rain and windy days.

barcelona.january: Cool but not harsh, 6–14°C, some rain.
barcelona.february: Cool, 7–15°C, mostly dry with sunny spells.
barcelona.may: Warm, 14–22°C, great for walking the city.
barcelona.june: Warm to hot, 18–26°C, beach season starts.
barcelona.august: Hot and humid, 22–30°C, peak beach crowds.

istanbul.january: Cold and damp, 3–9°C, rain and occasional snow.
istanbul.february: Cold, 3–10°C, mix of rain and cloudy days.
istanbul.march: Cool, 5–13°C, start of spring with showers.
istanbul.october: Mild, 12–20°C, more rain but still nice.

bangkok.january: Hot and relatively dry, 22–32°C, one of the best months to visit.
bangkok.may: Very hot and humid, 26–34°C, start of rainy season.
bangkok.november: Warm, 23–32°C, less rain and more comfortable.
bangkok.december: Warm and pleasant, 21–31°C, drier and popular for tourists.

singapore.february: Hot, 25–31°C, slightly drier but still humid.
singapore.june: Hot and humid, 26–32°C, hazy days possible.
singapore.july: Similar to June, 26–32°C, short, intense storms.
singapore.november: Wet and humid, 24–30°C, part of monsoon season.
singapore.december: Cooler by local standards, 24–30°C, frequent rain.

sydney.march: Late summer, 17–26°C, still great for beaches.
sydney.october: Mild to warm, 13–22°C, good outdoor weather.
sydney.december: Warm, 18–25°C, start of peak summer season.

san francisco.january: Cool and damp, 8–14°C, rainy winter days.
san francisco.april: Mild, 10–17°C, breezy with fog near the coast.
san francisco.may: Mild, 11–18°C, more sunshine but still cool.
san francisco.june: Cool to mild, 12–19°C, morning fog common.
san francisco.july: Cool for summer, 12–19°C, foggy and breezy.
san francisco.august: Similar to July, 12–20°C, many foggy mornings.
san francisco.september: Mild to warm, 13–21°C, often the sunniest month.
san francisco.december: Cool and wet, 8–14°C, winter storms possible.

berlin.march: Cold to cool, 1–9°C, slow start to spring.
berlin.december: Cold, -1–5°C, possible snow and Christmas markets.

athens.february: Cool, 6–14°C, a mix of sun and showers.
athens.april: Pleasant, 11–20°C, great for ruins and walking.
athens.october: Mild, 16–24°C, some rain but still comfortable.

cairo.april: Warm to hot, 16–28°C, dusty winds possible.
cairo.december: Mild and cool, 10–21°C, dry and sunny.
